participant_1.background:
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.
i want to learn how to fly an airplane.
My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.
i like camping and the outdoors in general.
My most prized possession is my running shoes because they have helped me to stay healthy and active throughout the years.

participant_2.background:
I am a good welder and have a knack for making new friends.
I want to change my look to reflect my new single status.
I work during the day, spend my lunch break reading about puppy training and dog care, and then play rpg computer games at night.
i am six feet tall.
I can't wait to wear my new sweater when I go horseback riding.

content.text: Hey there, I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry. How was your day?
My day was good, thanks for asking! I worked during the day, then spent my lunch break reading about puppy training and dog care. I love dogs! What are your hobbies?
I like camping and the outdoors in general. I also want to learn how to fly an airplane. I love going on adventures!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to fly an airplane too. I love going on adventures as well! I recently went horseback riding for the first time and it was a blast!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been horseback riding before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to get some exercise.
I will definitely look into it! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
